name: Metrics
description: Tracking the success of your project helps you make informed decisions and communicate impact effectively.
author: GitHub
inLanguage: English, Chinese (Traditional)/繁體中文, Chinese (Simplified) / 简体中文, Turkish/Türkçe, Greek/Ελληνικά, Spanish/Español, Persian/Farsi, French/Français, Tamil/தமிழ், German/Deutsch, Swahili, Russian/Русский, Bulgarian/Български, Romanian, Portuguese, Bengali/Bangla, Polish, Hindi, Nigerian Pidgin, Dutch, Malay, Korean/한국어, Japanese/日本語, Italian, Indonesian, Hungarian/Magyar
abstract: Understand the importance of tracking and analyzing metrics to evaluate the health and success of your open source project. This guide highlights key metrics, tools, and practices to monitor project activity and community growth.
mentions: These guides are available in over 20 languages.
